text: James Haynes (10 November 1933 - 6 January 2021) was a British sociologist and writer. He was a former figure in the British "underground" and alternative/counter-culture scene of the 1960s. He was the founder of Edinburgh's Traverse Theatre, the paper International Times and the London Arts Lab in Drury Lane. Haynes died on 6 January 2021 at his home in Paris, aged 87. ==References== Category:1933 births Category:2021 deaths Category:British sociologists Category:Writers from London
title: Jim Haynes
